1.name: One
1.info: Can only be fired once per day. Deals 10x Damage.

3.name: Adorable
3.info: 25% chance to distract Enemies with baby animal hallucinations.

4.name: Gaudy
4.info: Highly reflective, which can be used to temporarily blind Enemies, giving them -3 on Attack Rolls.

5.name: Cheerful
5.info: Grants +1 to all Talk Checks while equipped.

6.name: Jumbled
6.info: Has the Accuracy and Damage of one gun type, but the Range and bonuses of another.

7.name: Classy
7.info: Gun will only fire if the wielder has the pinky of their shooting hand out.

8.name: Economic
8.info: Enemies drop 2 gold per Hit and 5 gold per Crit.

9.name: Certain
9.info: Grants a +2 bonus during Badass attempts.

11.name: Lively
11.info: This gun has an Al that thinks it's alive. It can open any door once per day.

12.name: Bitter
12.info: Enemies get -1 to their Attack Rolls for each Enemy killed by this gun in this encounter.

14.name: Deafening
14.info: Screams when fired. dealing 1 Damage to all adjacent targets.

15.name: Selfish
15.info: Deals 1d6 Damage to wielder when changing to another equipped gun.

16.name: Obtainable
16.info: Must be picked up using an Interact (17+) Check. Deals 2x Damage.

19.name: Tart
19.info: Enemies react as if they have eaten something tart, getting -1 to their next Attack Roll.

20.name: Worried
20.info: Crits have a 50% chance to make BR 8 or less Enemies flee.

21.name: Swift
21.info: Grants a free Melee Attack each turn.

22.name: Two
22.info: Creates a duplicate gun. Must be fired at the same time. 3x Damage.

23.name: Toothsome
23.info: Gets a Bite Attack each turn for 1d6 Damage to an adjacent target.

24.name: Light
24.info: Fires rays of light that deal +1d6 Incendiary Damage.

25.name: Boundless
25.info: Generates a Loot Pile when it Hits an Enemy.

27.name: Elfin
27.info: Increases Movement by 1 square while firing.

29.name: Small
29.info: Can have a 4th gun equipped as long as this gun is equipped.

30.name: Pumped
30.info: Lifts Enemies Hit a foot off of the ground.

31.name: Horrible
31.info: Enemies killed by this gun explode.

32.name: Fresh
32.info: First Attack of an encounter deals 2x Damage.

33.name: Zesty
33.info: Enemies killed by this gun grant the wielder 1 Badass Token.

34.name: Utter
34.info: Has a secret password that activates 3x Damage for 2 turns. Wielder can guess once per encounter.

35.name: Far-Flung
35.info: Double the Range of any Thrown item while this gun is equipped.

36.name: Superb
36.info: Grants +1 to Mods on the gun.

37.name: Knotty
37.info: Ties an Enemy's shoes together, reducing their Movement by 1.

38.name: Wrathful
38.info: Deals 2x Damage to Enemies that have Damaged the wielder.

39.name: Panoramic
39.info: Fires in a 180 degree arc. Hits/Crits can each be applied to a different Enemy in Range.

40.name: Critical
40.info: Rolled Hits become Crits. Rolled Crits become misses.

41.name: Practical
41.info: Swapping to a different gun grants the wielder a Badass Token.

42.name: Strong
42.info: Grants +1 to all Interact Checks while equipped.

43.name: Relevant
43.info: Will deliver cryptic information on a topic up to 3x a day.

44.name: Tense.
44.info: 30% chance to taze the Enemy, dealing 1d6 Shock Damage.

45.name: Stupendous
45.info: Double the Hits of this gun. Attacks deal 2d4 Damage to the wielder.

46.name: Suitable
46.info: Can disguise the wielder in a suit of any kind once per day.

47.name: Unwieldy
47.info: Twice the size of a normal gun. 2x Damage. Reloading takes 2 turns.

48.name: Woozy
48.info: Each time an Enemy is Hit by this gun, 10% chance they pass out.

49.name: Grotesque
49.info: Gun looks horrific, possibly cursed. A counter increases every time it kills an Enemy.

51.name: Tawdry
51.info: When Reloaded, becomes a grenade that deals 3d8 Damage.

52.name: Nutty
52.info: Instantly kills any Enemy with a nut allergy.

53.name: Adhesive
53.info: Enemies Hit begin to stick to anything they come into contact with.

55.name: Mixed
55.info: For each Hit/Crit, gather the next die for Damage - d6,d8,d10,d12,d20.

56.name: Aback
56.info: Enemies Hit in the front are spun backwards.

57.name: Labored
57.info: Adds +3 DMG Mod if standing still.

58.name: Questionable
58.info: Deals 2x Damage to Enemies that can question their existence.

59.name: Aberrant
59.info: Gains the stats of a random gun type.

60.name: Resolute
60.info: Cannot be fired on the first turn of an encounter. Deals 2x Damage.

61.name: Far
61.info: Double the Range of this gun.

62.name: Mad
62.info: Enemies Hit have a 50% chance of being Taunted.

63.name: Grey
63.info: Deals 2x Damage. Enemies Hit drop 1 less Loot Pile and only drop Common items.

64.name: Damp
64.info: Creates puddles of water under Enemies Hit.

65.name: Actually
65.info: Can reroll Accuracy once per turn when firing this gun.

66.name: Jazzy
66.info: 10% chance the non-Boss Enemy lets go of any weapons and starts doing 'jazz hands.'

67.name: Frightening
67.info: Enemies within 2 squares are compelled to take Cover.

68.name: Shaky
68.info: Gun shakes uncontrollably; Enemies Hit also shake uncontrollably.

69.name: Scintillating
69.info: 50% chance to Hit the chest or groin of Enemy.

70.name: Handsomely
70.info: Add Damage equal to your Talk modifier.

71.name: Hysterical
71.info: Enemies Hit burst out laughing, causing -1 to Attack Rolls.

72.name: Impolite
72.info: Randomly burps out a Loot Pile when fired.

73.name: Unable
73.info: Enemies Hit cannot take Mayhem Actions.

74.name: Towering
74.info: Wielder appears twice their size while gun is equipped.

75.name: Parallel
75.info: Rounds split into 2 parallel lines that can Hit Enemies in 2 adjacent squares.

76.name: Mundane
76.info: Grants +1 to all Sneak Checks while equipped.

78.name: Disgusted
78.info: Deals + 1d6 Corrosive Damage. Enemies killed die badly.

79.name: Imaginary
79.info: Appears as if you are not holding any gun. Makes fake firing noises when fired.

80.name: Knowing
80.info: Knows all. Can ask the gun a question once per day.

81.name: Joyous
81.info: Plays upbeat music when being fired.

82.name: Clever
82.info: Grants +1 to all Insight Checks while equipped.

83.name: Abhorrent
83.info: Enemies cannot stay within 1 square while this gun is equipped.

84.name: Open
84.info: Once per turn, you may Reload this gun as a free Action without generating Mayhem.

85.name: Several
85.info: Splits into 2 guns that are dual wielded.

86.name: Honorable
86.info: All rounds Hit Enemies in the front.

88.name: Madly
88.info: Enemies Hit have 50% chance of becoming Confused.

89.name: Obnoxious
89.info: Guaranteed Insight Check once per day but you have to listen to the gun drone on and on and on.

90.name: Holistic
90.info: Damage is dealt to Shield, Armor, and Health.

91.name: Few
91.info: Max 1 Hit. Deal an additional 3 Damage for each unused Hit.

info: Enemies Hit are considered to be under a legally binding

92.name: Legal
92.info: contract to drop 1 extra Loot Pile when they die.

93.name: Abiding
93.info: Grants +1 to all Search Checks while equipped.

94.name: Unfair
94.info: An Extra Attack with this gun does not generate Mayhem.

95.name: Tender
95.info: Converts 10% of Damage dealt into Health for an adjacent ally.

96.name: Same
96.info: Enemies Hit will take an equal amount of Damage from the gun for each Attack.

97.name: Overconfident
97.info: If Accuracy Roll is 10 or less, all Hits are Crits.

98.name: Eatable
98.info: Can consume the gun when Reloading to gain 2d4 Health.

99.name: Thirsty
99.info: Converts 10% of Damage dealt into Health.

100.name: Imminent
100.info: Enemies Hit take increasing Damage each turn, starting at 1 and adding 1 with each Hit/turn.
